name: Swim Classes - Level 1
description: This class is designed to orient participants to the aquatic environment and to help them gain basic aquatic skills. In addition, participants start learning about how to be safe around water. Children must be 48" to participate. Registration is limited to one class per participant.
fullDescription: This class is designed to orient participants to the aquatic environment and to help them gain basic aquatic skills. In addition, participants start learning about how to be safe around water. Children must be 48" to participate. Registration is limited to one class per participant.
whatTheyOffer: This class is designed to orient participants to the aquatic environment and to help them gain basic aquatic skills. In addition, participants start learning about how to be safe around water. Children must be 48" to participate. Registration is limited to one class per participant.
howToGetIt: Register online at sfrecpark.org/register or call the registration hotline at (628) 652-2900
address: Geary and Steiner Street, San Francisco, CA, 94115
